Here is the list of signs and their scores:
1. Aries - 7/10 - Natural leaders, but can be impulsive and reckless.
2. Taurus - 8.5/10 - Reliable and practical, but can be stubborn and materialistic.
3. Gemini - 9/10 - Quick-witted and adaptable, but can be restless and indecisive.
4. Cancer - 6.5/10 - Emotionally sensitive and caring, but can be moody and overly attached.
5. Leo - 8/10 - Confident and charismatic, but can be prideful and dominating.
6. Virgo - 9.5/10 - Analytical and hardworking, but can be perfectionistic and critical.
7. Libra - 8.5/10 - Diplomatic and social, but can be indecisive and people-pleasing.
8. Scorpio - 9.5/10 - Passionate and intense, but can be controlling and secretive.
9. Sagittarius - 8/10 - Adventurous and optimistic, but can be reckless and tactless.
10. Capricorn - 7.5/10 - Ambitious and responsible, but can be cold and unemotional.
11. Aquarius - 9/10 - Humanitarian and independent, but can be aloof and unpredictable.
12. Pisces - 8/10 - Empathetic and imaginative, but can be dreamy and unreliable.
Note: The scores are based on the traditional astrological interpretations of each sign's strengths and weaknesses.
